translations: v.到期，失效；死亡；呼气，吐气；（任期）届满

phrs.translation: 断气, 到期, 终止, 过期
有效期, 截止日期, 到期日期, 到期日
在到期, 到期, 在届满
失效时间, 超时时间, 过期时间
逝世, 呼气, 期满, 满期

sentences.sentence: When does your driving licence expire?
sentences.translation: 你的驾照什么时候到期？

sentences.sentence: Library Cards expire after four years.
sentences.translation: 图书馆借书证四年后到期。

sentences.sentence: He is planning another tour abroad, yet his passport will expire at the end of this month.
sentences.translation: 他计划再次出国旅行，但他的护照将于本月底到期。
